meanings.definition: To scatter or splash in small drops or particles.
meanings.sent1: The artist spattered paint on the canvas to create a unique effect.
meanings.sent2: The chef accidentally spattered sauce on his apron while cooking.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy spattered mud all over the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: The storm spattered rain against the window, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The children spattered glitter on the birthday card to make it sparkle.

meanings.definition: Covered with scattered drops or particles.
meanings.sent1: The spattered walls showed evidence of a messy paint job.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was spattered with colorful paint from the art class.
meanings.sent3: The spattered car looked like it had been through a paintball battle.
meanings.sent4: The spattered sidewalk glistened under the streetlights after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The spattered ceiling tiles gave the room a unique, artistic look.
